name: Alana Grant
text: Today was my first visit at Classy Lash Studio & it was absolutely AMAZING!!!!! Not only is the studio spotlessly clean, but the environment was so soothing and relaxing that I was actually able to nap during the process. Terri's warm welcome made me feel right at home while in her care. She applies her expert skills and experience to deliver the most beautiful eye-catching results for her clients. She also uses her knowledge to educate her clients on the care of the lashes between visits. I'm already looking forward to my next visit.

name: Shaunise Thomason
text: I had my lashes done today and the experience was amazing. The decor was so beautiful. The relaxed ambiance and comfortable chair were the perfect combination for me to take a much needed nap. I hadn’t had any rest all week because I was working and preparing for my vacation. Terri explained each step of the process before she began. She has such a sweet spirit and is very professional. The smell of the candles made the atmosphere even better. She explained the after care for the lashes as well as the rewards program. I will definitely be back. My eyelashes turned out beautiful and natural looking. She used the perfect length so it wouldn’t interfere with me wearing my glasses. I appreciate the time she took to get my lashes perfect. I highly recommend Classy Lash Studio.

name: Katelyn Blanton
text: 100/10 would definitely recommend! My first time ever getting lashes and she made sure my experience was amazing. Very very clean work place and super classy. She’s very gentle, takes her time and talks you through everything. And just all around an amazing and sweet person, will most definitely be going back. Thanks so much girl ❤️

name: Amanda Sober
text: I'm very happy with my eyelashes Terry does a great job she is real sweet and wonderful it was really relaxing overall experience was amazing

name: Lisa Kimble
text:
I have never had lash extensions before and let me just say I am in LOVE! 😍
10/10 across the board. Beautiful spotless studio, relaxing environment, and amazing work! I was walked through every step of the process and given thorough aftercare instructions. Definitely recommending all of my friends!

name: JAZZY JOHNSON
text: A1 service from start to finish and my lashes came out so pretty. Her studio looks and smells nice and clean. I was very comfortable...comfortable enough to fall asleep while she did my lashes. Will definitely be back.

name: SharonRae Husbands
text: Terri offers a calming atmosphere and you leave with gorgeous lashes.  I love her appointment system and she has a reward program.  Will be a regular customer!

text: Terry is AH-mazing!!  Her studio is clean, quiet with the most comfortable chair ever.  She is professional, efficient and did exactly what I requested.  Undoubtedly the best lash experience ever!  I would def go back and willingly refer her to anyone wanting to get lashes!!

text: Great selection and good tips about makeup

name: Dominique Hudson
text: I absolutely LOVED this place! Erika did my eyelash extensions, and she was so fun and sweet! she was very personable and likable, and it really felt like I made a friend! with it being my first time I was a little nervous but they had really nice music playing and she gave me water and a snack. she did such a good job on my lashes, too! i’m loving them! I highly recommend this place! it is expensive yes, but you won’t regret it!

resp.text: Dominique, it was certainly a pleasure to have you as our guest. We loved giving you a new lash look. Thanks for the kind words. We are so very happy your experience was a great one.

name: Melissa Morrison-Ellis
text: Another fabulous lash-up and a much needed lash-nap! I remain impressed with the staff's skills and enjoy the ease and benefits of my membership. I've been getting services here for over a year and through the pandemic as allowed.

name: D T
text: Deyawn!! Is awesome!! Great service and very professional!! This was my second appointment and I booked a third!! The environment is clean, relaxing and beautiful! You will not be disappointed!! Book with her!! My eyebrows look AMAZING!!!

name: Alexis
text: I originally went to Les Femmes for my lashes and showed them pictures of what I used to have.  They were way off from what I showed them and way to long. I wanted to rip my lashes off so bad.  I discovered the lash lounge and they were able to remove my lashes and add on a new set and replicate from the pictures of what I used to have!  Great atmosphere. The ladies are very friendly and make sure you are comfortable!  I go back now every 2-3weeks for my fill!

name: Anita McLamb (McLamb Group Media)
text: I am blown away by my lashes I received today! Lash Lounge is top notch from the professional atmosphere, customer service, explanation of the procedure. This is an extensive process that not only takes precision but patience as well. I didn't think it was possible but I literally fell asleep because I was so relaxed. Well done Deshawn!

name: Sam Paxton
text: I love the Lash Lounge! I got a full set of silk eyelashes at their soft opening and have received two fill ins since. It has been great every time. Kionte is amazing and really precise and particular at making your lashes look how you want them to. I have been blown away by the customer service here. The salon is clean and professional. They offer a monthly membership which saves me $50/month since I get my lashes filled in every two weeks.  I would highly recommend.

name: Jordan Spencer
text: You can’t go wrong with The Lash Lounge! I sincerely appreciate the professionalism but cleanliness is what makes me come back again and again. Overall, I’ve had several relaxing experiences and hope to have many more.

name: Austin Spencer
text: Such a clean and professional environment! Not only were the employees friendly and inviting, but the owner was extremely accommodating and genuine... and not to mention the superb quality of the lashes as well! Definitely one of the best lashing experiences I’ve ever had. A 5 star rating is truly an understatement compared to the level of service that the lash lounge provides. I highly recommend getting your lash extensions from the lash lounge, my overall experience was phenomenal, definitely coming back! ✨

name: Scarlett Cochran
text:
I loved my first set so I returned and even got the package for continued sets. The second visit wasnt as great. She didnt listen to what I asked for. I wanted natural but enhanced, but I got full blown thick long volume. Didnt look natural at all. I left for a trip 2 days later. I ONLY got a call to correct it after I reviewed them. Not happy with the 2nd visit. I will return and hope for a better 3rd. I still recommend them just be sure to verify what you want more than once.

Update: Deyawn saved the day!!! Thank you to the front staff as well. Customer Service was fantastic!

name: Gen Connell
text: The ladies here are always the sweetest and my lashes always look great!

name: M J
text: The service is great!

name: Dr. Yvette Thomas
text: This place is awesome. Wonderful staff

name: Dana Smith
text: I really enjoyed the experience the ladies at the Lash lounge provided.Unfortunately I was unable to continue wearing my lashes.

name: Marticia B.
text: It was okay

name: Daphne Wilkerson
text: Very professional.

name: Cassie Phillips
text: Sam does mine and my daughter's eyelash extensions and she's amazing!!I suggest if your looking for a skilled lash artist she's the way to go!!

name: Emily Cryer
text: Very friendly and great service, but the trim and color was not worth 100 a piece for me and my niece. Other than that great place

name: Miranda Williams
text: Rhonda and Lisa are great hairstylist....great people, and take great pride in their customers satisfaction....great cuts, colors, and hair styles!

name: Tabitha Smith
text: Love love love katelynn she is awesome

name: Miguel Romero
text: Super sweet people got me in and out quick! Lisa did an amazing job with my hair

name: Dottie Greene
text: My experience was great. Beautiful haircut, good atmosphere, friendly staff.. I will be returning to see Rhonda.

name: Chickenwings 0181
text: Melissa is the best!

name: Leah Patterson Lust
text: Excellent Salon.  Wheelchair accessibility of the shop is really good.  The staff members are friendly and Melissa McKenzie accommodates all of my needs for full service in my wheelchair well. I always feel welcome there and I'm very happy with the services provided.

name: Amy Hancock
text: Melissa McKenzie at Salon Generations is a miracle worker. She always does a great job on my cut and color. She is the only person I would trust to say do what you think will look good and I always love it.

name: Allison Nisley
text: Absolutely the best salon in Cullman hands down! Melissa McKenzie is the best color artist, that has ever done my hair. Every one compliments my hair and asks where I get it done. I love all the girls that work there. It's a very fun and non judgemental place to go. Very enjoyable experience while you get your hair done.

name: Amy Hancock
text: Love Melissa! She is the only hair stylist I would trust cutting and coloring my hair. I usually just say do whatever you think and it always turns out amazing! I always get people coming up to me asking who does my hair.

name: Jo Mazzara
text:
I have used Salon Generations for a long time not only are all the operators stylist sweet and friendly the salon is beautiful and I love every hair cut I have ever gotten there for several different stylist.  However Pat is my favorite and my hair always looks terrific I get more compliments and then people want to know where I get my hair cut I am glad to share this information it is hard to find a good stylist and especially someone that can cut short hair Pat is fantastic!!
I sure miss all of them since I recently moved away - and I am having a hard time trying to find someone that can cut my hair.

LOL

name: Emily Touchet
text: if you're looking to get a perm this is NOT the place to go. or at least don't go see bridgette!!! this place is only good for getting your hair cut or colored. if i could give them 0 stars i would. don't waste your money or your time i spent $125 on a perm and walked out the door with absolutely nothing. and then she would refuse to give me a refund on it. just don't see bridgette if you're wanting to get your hair permed that's all. if you don't know how to do a perm then go back to school & learn!! stop taking people's money for something you can't do.

name: Bonnie Porter
text: Great salon!  Always friendly and ready to do an ything you need!  Staff is awesome and always Happy!  Salon very clean and offers a variety of services.

name: Jennifer Wray
text: We love Jenny. She always does exactly what we ask for.

name: Lisa Miller
text: Lisa has been doing my hair over 10 yrs always been satisfied with the cuts and hilights

name: Melissa McKenzie
text: I LOVE my job!!  Salon Generations is such a fun place to work. We have all been together for a long time and enjoy each other very much. We are family!  They are my very best friends. And every single one of them are amazing artists!! You never know what you'll hear, and that's ok we like that! We have an open floor and enjoy conversation about any topic. We aren't always, ok hardly ever, politically correct and that's ok we like that too! It's a really fun place! =)

name: Gary Harper
text: Great Salon, went on service call. Got a haircut by Sharon the owner. Gary @ Gulf Appliance Service

name: Penny Brock
text: Great people. Never stop laughing !!😂😂😂

name: Sherry Youngblood Wester
text: My favorite salon for several years.

name: Alan Farwell
text: Gonna miss Pat

name: Shelly McMillan
text: Pat does great work

name: Tamara Higgins
text: I moved to Tennessee and I still go back to Pat! Enough said!

name: Brandon Tucker
text: Simply the best.

name: nursiecp68
text: Lisa is the best!!!

name: Laklee Shedd
text: Love this place!!!!💖💖💖💖💖

name: Katelyn Olive
text: This place is AMAZING!! The girls there are so sweet and very talented. I get my brows tinted&laminated and LOVE IT. You cannot go wrong with any service here. 1000/10 would recommend 🤩

name: Karen Graham
text: I love the look after getting the Classic set.  I barely have any lashes of my on so this has been a game changer.  The only thing I have a problem with is the eye I sleep on.  I suggest getting a silk pillow case.  Also the same eye I sleep on happens to be the same side my hair parts so it hangs down in my lashes and it effects how well it holds up.  My advice on that is when you are at home and not going out pull the hair out of your eyes with a barrette and I even sleep with it.  Thanks Brailyn for giving me lashes I can see now. 😊

name: Kirstie Harrison
text: I had the most amazing experience here! They definitely make you feel like the absolute best version of yourself. All of the girls are warm, sweet, and fabulous! It’s just a wonderful vibe from the time you walk in until the time you leave. They are extremely talented and professional. You will not regret coming to Pretty by Coco!

name: Eva Burden
text: One of the best places ever ! The girls are so sweet and do an amazing job !

text: Chloe is amazing! My lashes look so good when I get them done. I always get so many compliments! She is very nice and makes you feel comfortable! She will not disappoint.

text: Only place I’ll ever get my lashes done! Chloe and Brailyn have done an amazing job on mine!! So cute and clean💕💕

name: Lindsey Holt
text: Chloe is an absolute delight! My lashes look like a DREAM and the time spent in her space went by so quickly! She’s friendly and professional and her work speaks for itself. Lots of “your lashes look great - did you do something different?” and “your eyes look brighter!” - all while skipping the eye makeup and avoiding the attempt to glue flash eyelashes on each day. The product is fabulous, and being able to support an independent business owner is the cherry on top. So glad to have met Chloe and to have received such a great product for a very fair price. Can’t wait to return for a fill-in, because the “lashes lifestyle” is for me!

name: Mary Dixon
text: Pretty by Coco is AMAZING!! She is so sweet and talented and has added so many more talented girls into her business! Go check her out!!!!

text: I’ve ALWAYS wanted pretty, flattering, sexy lashes. Chloe has made that a reality for me. She has a true talent for lash extensions. Not only do I have pretty lashes, thanks to Chloe, but they look natural. She is amazingly calm and steady. She is professional, clean, and the sweetest!!! I wouldn’t use anyone else.

text:
If you don't complain about mistakes,
the owner and technitions are very nice. Beware, however, if you're brave enough to stick up for yourself what you pay for. There was a clear reluctance to correct a sloppy job on one nail, as though I must have imagined it, and when the tech finally fixed the nail, I thanked her and remarked how much better it looked, but the owner laughed out loud, tilting her head to  the ceiling, sarcastically.
Take what you want from this honest review, but they'll never see me again.

Tracey has done my lashes for years and I've always left with beautiful, perfect lashes.  She does such maticulas work that they last and look beautiful for quite a long time.  My daughter's and I have also had our nails done,and everything is always perfect. .  They are all amazing at what they do and care about their client's.

name: ch mrtns
text:
I used to like deluxe nails, I’ve done gel manicure with Nikki and Randy and I was pleased with the results. I’ve tried other nail technicians at the salon and the results were always inconsistent. Now I can see that the service has steadily declined.
This last time I went there Randy was not available and I ended up getting my nails done with this lady that suggested for me to get SNS. Obviously she had no clue what she was doing, I could sense her insecurities, I’ve chose black and my nails are far from black, I can see thru many spots, uneven on the sides and missing spots on the edges, plus some of my nails are different spots. I called to speak with the manager and she’s offered to get my nails removed and done again. I told her that I wanted to get only gel to avoid an unsatisfactory result and she said she would not refund the difference. I’ve paid $35 for SNS and gel is $25. She told me she is already offering me to fix the nails but she won’t give me a $10 credit. Worse customer service, if I could put a negative 5 star I would. I told her that unfortunately I would not go back to support her business and she hung up the phone on me. I wish Randy would find another nail salon to work so I could continue getting my nails done with him, he does an exceptional job!

name: Elizabeth Moody
text: The Signature Deluxe Pedicure is AMAZING! 2 hours of massage, pampering, exfoliating, expert painting & bliss.

name: Suzanne Callaghan
text: I have been coming here for four years and the service and quality have steadily declined.  Last month I got a "deluxe" pedicure, and the tech barely scrubbed my heels with a pumice leaving my feet just the same as when I walked in, except for alot of rubbing of lotion and some hot stones.  Worst pedicure of my life.  Then today, I go in for a gel fill in only (had learned the hard way about pedicures) and my nails were great, just what I asked for...then they charge me $11 more than the menu states, and they start gibbering about me having repairs....this is absolutely not true.  No new nails were put on today and I left with the same tips that I came in with.  One girl came out to look at what the menu said the price should be, and admitted to me that it was wrong.  I stood there waiting to be refunded $11 and the manager hands me $2.  I left at that point because $9 is not worth arguing about, but made it clear that I would not be back.  They rely heavily on acting like they don't understand English well...and get away with it because most don't bother to see if they were charged the correct amount,  and just blindly hand them their card and sign.  This is not the first instance that this has happened here, so I've heard.  It's a shame that they treat customers like that, as we need a good, reputable salon in Fairhope.  I will be driving to Daphne from now on.

name: Wanda Thompson
text: There is no way I would go anywhere else. The best!!

And I HIGHLY recommend anyone to go to The Nail Place in Robertsdale AL. That is where im going and staying for now on!

name: Rob Schwartz
text: Wax all over my shirt. Went in for facial wax, they squeezed me into a tiny room with another lady lying on a table with 2 working on her. I was a little uncomfortable as she seemed to be sleeping through her treatment & probably wanted some privacy.  I had on a nice shirt, I was sitting in a regular chair, not leaning back, no towel or anything over my shirt. I have had it done sitting up elsewhere with no dripping so didn't worry about it until I was paying and she started rubbing at my shirt, which probably made it worse. Have had a nice mani there, however, it is almost always crowded and very hectic, never relaxing. So if you want it fast I'd say go but if you want to enjoy the experience find somewhere else.

I had a vacation planned for Jamaica and wanted my toes to look great. I asked for a pedi and then acrylic for my toes. When I was getting my pedi they told me that the acrylics we're going to be 18.00, my friend and I both heard it. I went to check out and they said they total was 18.00, my friend and I thought it was a little strange that it was all only 18.00 but ok. Come to find out they were saying 80.00!!!!

I explained to them we both heard 18.00 multiple times and nowhere did it state that it was 80.00, on the board and in the brochure it said acrylics were 25.00 it was never specific to just fingernails.They refused to give on the price in any way!
Ridiculous price and VERY unhappy customer.

name: Anna Jackson
text: Stylist from this salon posted about me on social media, all while reading and not responding to my text. I couldn’t make my appointment due to an unexpected procedure on my shoulder which made me unable to move my left arm or sit in any one position for too long. Said in her post she was “an extremely understanding person” but couldn’t even be bothered to respond.

name: Carmen Bustin
text: WARNING!! Chelsea Loeb removed "Reviews" from her Facebook page, "Vanity Hair Studio at Sola Salons", @VanityHairStudio88, where her mother decided to intervene and childishly berate me. I didn't want to have to do this, but since the BBB in Northern Alabama closed my case as "Unresolved", because she didn't reply, as usual, so I have to take to social media to tell the Facts so this can't happen to anyone else. I sent this to BBB & posted a Google Review & will continue to post to make others aware! Chelsea Loeb has scarily moved on to jeopardize the business, "Sola Salon Studios (a.k.a.Vanity Hair Studio at Sola Salons), but EVERYONE should be warned!!!! 2&1/2months now My hair had teal/green streaks that was NEVER requested & now the streaks are fading to a rusty color. She said she would fix her mistake & ceased communication when the messages clearly showed "Read". Original hair plan, ALL OVER blue/black "PERMANENT" hair color. Then Chelsea spoke of some "Pre-lightening" streaks. Wasn't too sure what that was, but entrusted she knew what she was doing since I told her my "Original" hair plan. 1st Salon appt, 4/23/18, Chelsea only touched up grey roots on top half of head & "Pre-lightened" streaks & dyed them teal/green!! I asked for ALL OVER permanent hair color, not just partial roots, & did NOT ask for TEAL/GREEN! Chelsea then processed a 3rd color on my hair within 3 hours, to cover up her first mistake. After 3+ hours there, it was supposedly "fixed". Knew it wasn't, but after 3 hours, I was done. Reached out to her the next morning, 4/24/18, to have it fixed before our beach trip the following day, 4/25/18. Chelsea then supposedly applied a "permanent" all over color, what she called a blue "Fantasy Color", & was told to rarely wash my hair so the color wouldn't fade. I know enough about hair color that a "permanent process" should not "wash out" in showers. Unfortunately my nightmare came true. Ruined friend's linens we visited whilst on beach trip. Couldn't swim in Resort pool or at beach because blue was pouring out in showers & is was "washing out" 38 days later. I paid for "Permanent" color, not "wash out". Returned from beach trip & respectfully asked her for a refund on 4/30/18, since what I paid ($135) for was not remotely done. Chelsea replied, "Unfortunately we don't issue refunds since the time & product spent..." So I asked for it to be fixed "again" since I did not ask for the teal/green that's showing again since her 3rd color is "washing out". The same day, 4/30/18, Chelsea agreed she would once she returned from her beach trip. 5/7/18, I asked her what brand of "Fantasy Color" did she use so I can figure out how to get this color out for good for I was tired of ruining my own towels & linens. She replied the same day with "Pulp Riot", but didn't offer any other advice, considering she messed up my hair. Of course I followed thru and researched the product, only to find out that it "Washes out in 42 washes...". As stated before, I paid $135 for a "Permanent" hair color process. That same day 5/7/18, I asked if she could fit me in the following week to correct her mistake. No reply. One week later, 5/14/18, I messaged again to see if she can get me in next week. Still no reply. Most insulting is that the messages let you know once they've been read & Chelsea has "read" them, and still no reply. I don't want her touching my hair in fear she will ruin it more. I just want my refund so I can go elsewhere that's more professional & knowledgeable to fix HER mistake. Insult to injury were her Facebook posts during the 2 weeks I was requesting her to fix her mistake. She was clearly telling the Facebook public that she had openings. Why not reply to my requests to fix her mistakes?! Filed a BBB complaint May 14, 2018, & she had until May 31,  to respond. No reply. Then had 10 days to respond. No communication until 2nd BBB letter. My pictures and her complete disregard of her own negligence is proof enough on her lack in professionalism and customer service & is UNacceptable! Still "UNresolved"!

My hair looks and feels the best it has ever felt. I hate that I didn't start using her sooner but I am so excited for her to help me achieve my hair goals. text: DO NOT go to Summer Hornsby for anything! Not only is she horrible at doing color, but she’s also a THIEF! She left spots in my hair, black patches! My hair is breaking off and is completely damaged! She charged me 212, charged me for a hair cut and binding treatment both of which I didn’t receive. After I left the salon I realized she didn’t cut my hair so I asked her if I could come back another evening, she booked the appt but the next day i was doing my hair and noticed a lot of black spots in my blonde which made me livid. I sent her a polite text to which she replied that she would refund me the color and cut. It’s been over 10 days and I have not received a refund or any responses to my messages. Basically, this is worse than a bad stylist, Summer stole from me by not providing services that I paid her for.

text:
Rachel Patterson (studio 6-Salon Nova) is fantastic! She really knows her stuff and only Rachel will be cutting my hair from now on.

I just moved here a few months ago and when I got here I went to a highly recommended super expensive fancy salon (not going to name names...starts with a T...) and was handed over to a stylist that sliced and diced my hair into a inconsistent and uneven mess of layers. It was bad. I let it grow for about two months and decided it was time to try another hair cut.
I found reviews of Rachel's work online and they weren't lying. She was awesome! She amazingly fixed my hair and made it look better than it did before my horrible cut. She couldn't fix all the short layers this time but was able to blend them so they were not noticeable while we wait for them to grow more. Couldn't be happier! Thanks Rachel!

name: Erika B
text: My desired red hair color was achieved! It turned out amazing! I just didn't know it was gonna cost $600 to achieve it. I didn't have that much on me either.  Next time I'm going to ask more questions or it should be brought up on how much it could be. I'm no stylist so I don't know the cost and steps you have to take. That's why I called ahead of time..I was told $51, depending on how much color. I think it needs to be estimated while you're explaining how you want it. Other Salons told me I was Overcharged! And it should've been $350 MAX and that is celebrity pricing.

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback, Erika. We're disappointed that your experience with us wasn't 100% enjoyable and that you had "sticker shock" at the end of your appointment! We coach our stylists and Guest Experience Experts up front on informing clients that we can't give completely set prices on color corrections as the service and products used usually changes throughout the time spent on the  correction. However, you should have definitely been updated and consulted THROUGHOUT the appointment to ensure you and your stylist were on the same page the whole time! We will talk to the appropriate members of our staff to ensure this doesn't happen again. We are glad you love the color - the pictures of it are absolutely gorgeous!

name: Danii Small
text: This was my first visit to Society Salon & I will definitely be returning. Emily was my stylist and she is really fun and energetic.  Conversation with her was easy and flowed naturally. She is young but has been a stylist for 2 years and her experience & knowledge really showed through the amazing job she did with my hair!

resp.text: Thank you so much Danii! We are so glad you enjoyed your time with Emily!

name: Erika Blaydes
text: The salon is Glamorous! Clean and professional! I will return, but with more salon price educated.I wanted to be a deep red color, and it was achieved in 3 hrs. The only thing that I found upsetting after I was sooo very 😊 with the hair, was the total! $600!! Now,  the total shouldn't be a mystery while you are getting it done. It should be discussed about how much it will be when you are describing what you want to the stylist while she is evaluating your hair. And if its too high, then a different affordable approach. I'm not educated in this field, so I have no idea what steps have to be taken or how much those steps are, such as the $150/ hr. that I was charged. I was told differently on the appt. call. That was all the cash I had, barely enough to tip😒. So if the stylist want great tips, then make your clients more aware of the style price so they bring enough money.

resp.text: We appreciate the feedback, Erika. We're disappointed that your experience with us wasn't 100% enjoyable and that you had "sticker shock" at the end of your appointment! We coach our stylists and Guest Experience Experts up front on informing clients that we can't give completely set prices on color corrections as the service and products used usually changes throughout the time spent on the  correction. However, you should have definitely been updated and consulted THROUGHOUT the appointment to ensure you and your stylist were on the same page the whole time! We will talk to the appropriate members of our staff to ensure this doesn't happen again. We are glad you love the color - the pictures of it are absolutely gorgeous!

name: Fiona
text:
Wanted an ombre, got a balayage. Color turned out ok, blending not so great.

Editing review because this app won't let me reply: I actually called in and cancelled that appointment on 4/12 at 11AM. Please do not charge the no show fee. Thank you.

resp.text:
Fiona, thank you so much for your feedback. I’m sorry to hear that you are not satisfied with the service you received within our salon. I see that you did already book your next appointment with the same stylist but since it is within two weeks of your initial appointment, we would love for you to come in and allow us to make any changes at our cost that would make you love your hair. Please give us a call today at 256-665-3651 and ask to speak to Lauren, our manager. She will get you set up for an appointment sooner than your one scheduled in May. Thank you!

Edit: I talked to your stylist and front desk today regarding your initial appointment - I was informed that you were unable to receive your full ombré due to arriving very late to your appointment, therefore the stylist did not have enough time to do a full ombré for you. Unfortunately, When our application time is shortened due to the late arrival of the client - we have to alter the service.

name: Ashley Caccavale
text: I have never had a facial before so I spoke with Aurora about getting one. We discussed my skin type and she suggested their September special they are running. When I arrived she was waiting for me by the desk with a warming smile I could see under her mask! The atmosphere of the salon is so inviting. Aurora offered me water before and at the end of my service. During the whole appointment she made sure to tell me what she was doing, what the product was for, and made sure that I felt okay the entire time! In between applying new products we just got to chat about life. The entire experience was relaxing and the products even smell good! If I could give more than a 5 star rating I absolutely would. I highly suggest requesting Aurora when you book with Society Salon for any facial services!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the glowing review Ashley! We are so happy to hear that you had such a great experience at the salon and with Aurora!

name: Oneal Thomas
text: Not the best customer service, my sister came in to get her lashes done. Was promised that she wouldn't be charged for lash removal services since she only had about four or five lashes on at the time. She got there and after getting her lashes done they charged her even though they promised her before booking the appointment that she wouldn't be charged! plus her lashes didn't last long. She's not going public with this because of her high status in her company, but I'm glad people like me and her friends can express her disappointment in this company.

resp.text:
Hey Oneal. Please have your sister contact us directly. Every lash removal is charged for a lash removal. There has never been a time when our lash artists have approved not being paid for their time to remove a client’s lashes. I would like to speak with her so I can find out who misconstrued that information to her to cause such confusion as both of our Guest Experience Experts that handle scheduling, know that it is a service that always costs since it requires proper training and techniques to not compromise the client’s natural lashes.

There a multitude of factors that go into lashes not lasting long. And in this case, your sister, I’ll withhold her name too for the reasoning you stated, was informed for the beginning that she had short natural lashes - and going as long as she wanted to go could lessen the amount of time they would last. Getting them wet at all within 24 hours and proper at home protocols not being followed will also shorten the time.

All of this is explained at the appointment as well as some of it is notated on the waiver signed in the beginning of the appointment.

Again, please have your sister contact us directly so we discuss ways we can properly rectify this situation with her. Thanks!

***edited to add: I see she was already refunded a FULL refund for her full set 4 days ago. I’m not sure what else we can do to rectify this situation more than we have. I would still like to hear from her though who originally told her there would be no charge. Thank you

Or have her be the one to leave the review so we can be in direct contact with her. We always stand behind our work when proper at home maintenance is followed as well as when the take home products that are recommended at every new lash appointment are being used. Please have your friend reach out to use so we can help her.
